web.api package¶

Submodules¶

web.api.application module¶

Manage artifacts/application details to be downloaded from TeamCity

class web.api.application.Application(app_name, artifact_download_path, ignore_file_extensions, anchor_text)¶

Bases: web.api.build.Build

Derived class from Build to handle and save attributes of each artifacts to be downloaded from TeamCity.

It’s responsible for managing the download of but fetching the list of files from api and triggering the download and saving the files to the system

application_count = 0¶
artifact_file_details = None¶

downloaded_file_details will save the information of the files downloaded in a dict absolute_path : FileName

show_downloaded_info()¶

Print version information

web.api.build module¶

Basic information about artifacts/application details for download

class web.api.build.Build¶

Base class keep track of basic information of artifacts

This class will check if api of artifact has a successful build or not. If yes, will save information related to build id and version number and api. These will be used to fetch future information and start download by derived call Application
